channel.title: file_event on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in file_event on My New Hugo Site

item.title: MacOS Emond Launch Daemon
item.description: Detects additions to the Emond Launch Daemon that adversaries may use to gain persistence and elevate privileges.

item.title: Startup Items
item.description: Detects creation of startup item plist files that automatically get executed at boot initialization to establish persistence.
